channel.title: Blog Posts on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts on Home

item.title: Debugging : An under-rated superpower
item.description: Let us give a simple thought to this question: “How many times have you debugged some issue today?” You would be surprised that the number will be quite large than what you had initially expected. Debugging is such an important skill to possess. May it be: -The setup which is not working -Unable to connect to Zoom meetings (this has become a new way of working in this quarantine period) -VNC session not getting connected -Bluetooth not getting connected to the speaker And countless other experiences!

item.title: Leadership Essentials
item.description: I came across this amazing Udemy course by Chris Croft. I am not into managerial role. But I wanted to have knowledge about the essentials of leadership. So I took up this course and I was very impressed by all the points which were put across during the course. Sharing some points which I had taken while persuing the course. I hope you find it useful :) Leadership skills: leader vs manager [-] Leader more about getting things done [-] Manager more about motivation and knowing what ppl wants etc.
